butterfree.core.configs package¶

Subpackages¶

  • butterfree.core.configs.db package
    • Submodules
    • Module contents

Submodules¶

Holds functions for managing the running environment.

exception butterfree.core.configs.environment.UnspecifiedVariableError(variable_name: str)¶

Bases: RuntimeError

Environment variables not set error.

variable_name¶

environment variable name.

butterfree.core.configs.environment.describe_environment(*, bash_formatting: bool = True) → str¶

Describes the current running environment.

Parameters

  • bash_formatting – boolean indicating whether or not to use bash formatting markups.

  • * – TODO

Returns

Descriptions of the current running environment in human-readable

format.

butterfree.core.configs.environment.describe_variable(variable_name: str, *, bash_formatting: bool = True) → str¶

Describes an environment variable.

The description will state the variable’s name, current value and origin, where the origin may be the running environment or the specification default.

Parameters

  • variable_name – environment variable name.

  • bash_formatting – boolean indicating whether or not to use bash formatting markups.

  • * – TODO

Returns

Description of the requested environment variable in human-readable

format.

butterfree.core.configs.environment.get_current_environment() → str¶

Gets current environment tag.

It is expected to assume one of these values: “dev”, “forno”, “staging” or “prod”. The default is “dev”.

Returns

the value of the “ENVIRONMENT” environment variable.

butterfree.core.configs.environment.get_environment_specification(filename: str = None) → dict¶

Gets environment specification from a default file.

Parameters

filename – name of the file

Returns

Environment specification

butterfree.core.configs.environment.get_variable(variable_name: str, default_value: str = None) → str¶

Gets an environment variable.

The variable comes from it’s explicitly declared value in the running environment or from the default value declared in the environment.yaml specification or from the default_value.

Parameters

  • variable_name – environment variable name.

  • default_value – default value to use in case no value is set in the environment nor in the environment.yaml specification file.

Returns

The variable’s string value

butterfree.core.configs.environment.is_development() → bool¶

Check if is development environment.

Checks whether the running environment tag refers to a development env or

not.

Returns

True for development environment, False if don’t

butterfree.core.configs.environment.is_homolog() → bool¶

Check if is homolog environment.

Checks whether the running environment tag refers to a homolog env or not.

Returns

True for homolog environment, False if don’t

butterfree.core.configs.environment.is_production() → bool¶

Check if is production environment.

Checks whether the running environment tag refers to a production env or

not.

Returns

True for production environment, False if don’t

butterfree.core.configs.environment.is_staging() → bool¶

Check if is staging environment.

Checks whether the running environment tag refers to a staging env or not.

Returns

True for staging environment, False if don’t

Module contents¶

Holds configuration/setup for Butterfree components.
